javadoc: Adapter to access the Function Signature Definition database table.

methods.name: getAdapter
methods.comment:
Gets an adapter for working with the function definition data type database table. The adapter is based 
 on the version of the database associated with the specified database handle and the openMode.

params.name: handle
params.comment: handle to the database to be accessed.

params.name: openMode
params.comment: the mode this adapter is to be opened for (CREATE, UPDATE, READ_ONLY, UPGRADE).

params.name: monitor
params.comment: the monitor to use for displaying status or for canceling.

throws.comment: if the database handle's version doesn't match the expected version.
if there is trouble accessing the database.

return.comment: the adapter for accessing the table of function definition data types.

methods.name: findReadOnlyAdapter
methods.comment: Tries to get a read only adapter for the database whose handle is passed to this method.

params.name: handle
params.comment: handle to prior version of the database.

throws.comment: if a read only adapter can't be obtained for the database handle's version.

return.comment: the read only Function Definition data type table adapter

methods.name: upgrade
methods.comment: Upgrades the Function Definition data type table from the oldAdapter's version to the current version.

params.name: handle
params.comment: handle to the database whose table is to be upgraded to a newer version.

params.name: oldAdapter
params.comment: the adapter for the existing table to be upgraded.

throws.comment:
if the the table's version does not match the expected version
 for this adapter.
if the database can't be read or written.

return.comment: the adapter for the new upgraded version of the table.

methods.name: createRecord
methods.comment: Creates a database record for an function signature definition data type.

params.name: name
params.comment: the unique name for this data type.

params.name: comments
params.comment: comments about this data type.

params.name: categoryID
params.comment: the ID for the category that contains this data type.

params.name: returnDtID
params.comment: the ID of the data type that is returned by this function definition.

params.name: hasVarArgs
params.comment: true if this function definition has a variable length argument list.

params.name: genericCallingConvention
params.comment: generic calling convention

params.name: sourceArchiveID
params.comment: the ID for the source archive where this data type originated.

params.name: sourceDataTypeID
params.comment: the ID of the associated data type in the source archive.

params.name: lastChangeTime
params.comment: the time this data type was last changed.

throws.comment: if the database can't be accessed.

return.comment: the database record for this data type.

methods.name: getRecord
methods.comment: Gets a function signature definition data type record from the database based on its ID.

params.name: functionDefID
params.comment: the data type's ID.

throws.comment: if the database can't be accessed.

return.comment: the record for the function definition data type.

methods.name: getRecords
methods.comment: Gets an iterator over all function signature definition data type records.

throws.comment: if the database can't be accessed.

return.comment: the function definition data type record iterator.

methods.name: removeRecord
methods.comment: Removes the function definition data type record with the specified ID.

params.name: functionDefID
params.comment: the ID of the data type.

throws.comment: if the database can't be accessed.

return.comment: true if the record is removed.

methods.name: updateRecord
methods.comment: Updates the function definition data type table with the provided record.

params.name: record
params.comment: the new record

throws.comment: if the database can't be accessed.

methods.name: deleteTable
methods.comment: Deletes the function definition data type table from the database with the specified database handle.

params.name: handle
params.comment: handle to the database where the table should get deleted.

throws.comment: if the database can't be accessed.

methods.name: getRecordIdsInCategory
methods.comment: Gets all the function definition data types that are contained in the category that has the indicated ID.

params.name: categoryID
params.comment: the category whose function definition data types are wanted.

throws.comment: if the database can't be accessed.

return.comment: an array of IDs for the function definition data types in the category.

methods.name: getRecordIdsForSourceArchive
methods.comment:
Gets an array with the IDs of all data types in the function definition table that were derived
 from the source data type archive indicated by the source archive ID.

params.name: archiveID
params.comment: the ID of the source archive whose data types we want.

throws.comment: if the database can't be accessed.

name: FunctionDefinitionDBAdapter
comment: Adapter to access the Function Signature Definition database table.
